title: Accidental Mobster
description: When 15-year-old Danny Higgins goes to live with his wealthy godfather, he has no idea that heâ€™s being taken in by a mob family. He loves his new home and extravagant lifestyle. But on a fateful trip one night to the old diner downtown, Danny discovers his godfather makes a living in the mafia, and finds himself caught in a dangerous world.
author: M.M. Cox
